website_summaries.verdict: Basic rubber rain boots with easy-on handles and a cute frog design. They do run large so consider sizing down.
pros: Made from flexible rubber that allows more movement than an average rain boot
High cutoff point stops water from inside
Buyers report these are durable boots that last long enough to be handed down to younger siblings
cons: Not particularly warm so thick socks needed in cold weather

customer_reviews.title: True to size. Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this product for a week so I can't say for durability. But it seems durable and sturdy enough. It runs true to size. I was planning on getting 1 size up to make it last a couple of rainy seasons but decided against it because a reviewer said it runs large. It definitely doesn't. My son is a 10 & the 10 fits perfectly. My boy loves his new boots
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect four season boot! also so cute.
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing these, as we had them for my son last year. Work excellent as rain/snow boots with warm socks. We used them as boots for my sons halloween costume last year (a fireman) and then he used them all year from muddy fall days, to tree picking, to snow (easier to get on that a lot of snow boots - we had the ralph lauren ones and didn't use them) and then gardening in the mud in the spring. When he out grew them I bought a size up. Only thing is they run a little big.
customer_reviews.author: Molly A. Mendte

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: They fit well and super durable. Got them just in time for rains. Big feet here so I was concerned about how easily they would pull on, and big feet just slip right in and are comfortable. They are perfectly tough to come off so they don't fall off in the car or anytime we are off our feet.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. Our yard gets a bit muddy, so I bought these in hopes he could go out in the mud and they would be easy to clean- and they are! They are a little big, but that Isa good thing. He can use them longer. They are water proof and dry really fast, even on the inside. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie

customer_reviews.title: Quality cute firefighter boots!
customer_reviews.text: These boots shipped on time, were in perfect new condition and seem sturdy and high quality. My youngest daughter is going to be a firefighter for Halloween and these are the perfect addition. I ordered a 13 and she has room to grow, but it is not too big that she cannot walk in them. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: Super cute - poor spelling
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable and my 2 year old son loves them. I was a little embarrassed that I didn't notice in the pictures that rescue is spelled wrong as "resque". My mother pointed it out when my son put them on. Other than that they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: NickyP

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: My baby wears 5 and I ordered 6 because I was thinking it would be little bit big but not too much but it was way too big than I was expected; it was really loose and heavy. Love the design. I don’t know why I didn’t noticed that this boot is more expensive than similar products on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Ochk

customer_reviews.title: Liked until they ripped; 2nd pair same problem!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace a pair my grandson has worn for THREE years. These were bought in March of this year and a seam is already open. Very disappointed. UPDATE: Although the seller replaced the ripped boots immediately, the NEW set is in shambles. Both sides of both boots have huge gaps in the rubber where the foot bends forward. So disappointed as my grandson loves these and the fit is very good. See 2 pics below from today, 10/1/2019.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my four-year-old son. They fit great! He wears an 11.5 to 12 in shoes, and the size 12 fits well with a little extra room to grow too. My son has a high instep and in the past, Carter's rain boots have actually given him blisters. These ones are nice and roomy without being too loose. Tough, thick, and durable, but easy to walk in. Love these!
customer_reviews.author: K. Eaton

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: My soon-to-be 3-year-old loves these! They are so easy to put on with the loops and he is obsessed with everything about firefighters right now so he wears these everywhere. He has wide and thick feet, which makes finding good footwear a challenge, but these fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RosaBianca

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but...
customer_reviews.text: Jan 2020 update- after using these boots there is now a tear in the back of one of them, no longer able to use them when its wet. Dropped the stars to 3 due to not lasting after just 3 months. Oct 2019 - Our 5 year old loves this and works great.
customer_reviews.author: SnowRat

customer_reviews.title: Grandson likes the fireman boots!
customer_reviews.text: These were for my four year old grandson that doesn’t like to wear shoes. He still doesn’t like to wear shoes but with the recent rain in Ca. he can easily take the boots on and off. The fact that they are firemen boots is a plus and with his father in the Forestry service he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality boots! My son loves them and wears them everyday all day, and they are holding up well. I found that they do fit large. My son is a size 8 shoe so i ordered an 8, but they fit more like a 9-10
customer_reviews.author: Ilove2giggle95

customer_reviews.title: Not just for boys.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Fire Chief boots for a friends little girl who wants to be a firefighter. She received the boots and has been wearing them since! No complaints from her! Mom is picking battles so the boots are still on!! The order was shipped quickly. Product is well loved. As a female firefighter, I hope you change the description to mention kids/youth, not boys. I know one little girl who is excited to have them. There are plenty more who might be too.
customer_reviews.author: Kim-possible

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, durable and my 5 yr old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Easy to wear, thick and durable. I had to buy a half size bigger because my son has wide feet. They fit well, we have definitely put these to the test in mud and rain. Puddle jumping and frog hunting in the mud, his feet stayed dry and comfortable. My 5 yr old also LOVES them!! I highly recommend, they are made well.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole Maclennan

customer_reviews.title: My son loves these
customer_reviews.text: My nearly two-year-old son is obsessed with these boots! Despite the fact that they are too big for him (I ordered them large on purpose so they'd fit for awhile), he wants to wear them every day, rain or shine. They're colorful, fun, and great for puddle jumping. What more could you ask for?!
customer_reviews.author: K Donelan

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: great for the price. A little flimsy up top, but my toddler didn't seem to mind. They are pretty heavy for her and she does have trouble walking in them, but I think this is because of the large base of the shoe. But overall she loves splashing in these. And they have kept her successfully dry every time! She's wearing an 8 now and these still fit, so happy that there is some extra room to grow into these, but not sure how the sizes work for rainboots just yet.
customer_reviews.author: NRK

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: The rain boots are better than expected. The fit is perfect and they are absolutely adorable. Cant beat the price for the quality of product. They where a big hit for my 2.5 year old great nephew Paxton. He cant wait till it rains so he can wear them. Will definately be purchasing from Accessowear again!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Powers

customer_reviews.title: Buy these for your child!
customer_reviews.text: These rain boots are t-o-o-o cute. They are bright ( A safety factor ) and covered in frogs. There is also a matching frog raincoat equally as bright. The picture of the raincoat does not show the frogs. But they're there!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Much larger than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Got these in a 2 for my 8 year old and they were too large and fit my 10 yr old daughter with a little room as well. Order down a size maybe even two. Otherwise they are just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: jacinta

customer_reviews.title: Super cute fireman boots!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these boots. They are super cute with his fireman rain jacket. He doesn't complain about his feet hurting, so I gave it good reviews for fit and comfort. He's only 3, so he can't tell me if they have good arch supports. :) He's had them since last winter and they haven't come apart or cracked, so I'm giving them 5 stars. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Just right His pa, mother, and uncle are members of station five, just like the boots. Nicer than I expected. Good quality. Keeps feet dry and a smile on his face
customer_reviews.author: Happy legs

customer_reviews.title: Runs big even on chubby feet.. so cute. A keeper.
customer_reviews.text: My son is stride rite 10w.. I got size 11 knowing I might have to save them. They were super big. Four fingers sideways too big. Ordering a size 9 so he has a pair. Praying they will fit. So cute and easy to put on them. Minus 1 star just because of the uncertainty of size ordering
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter LOVES her boots!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my granddaughter rain boots last year and she wore them ALL the time. We needed to purchase a bigger size this year. She shopped with me on line to pick out the butterfly boots and is back to wearing them everywhere. She is three years old and is the center of attention everywhere we go.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: They were well me and my nephew loved them. They had a little room in them, which was great in case one wanted to wear them with a heavier sock. A very satisfied customer!
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Mineo

customer_reviews.title: GOOD BOOTS
customer_reviews.text: These boots are well made. The fireman's emblem on the side impressed my grandson. My only concern is the misspelling on the boots: Resque instead of Rescue.
customer_reviews.author: I'm Retired and You're Not

customer_reviews.title: MADE MY GRANDSON HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: THESE BOOTS ARE ABSOLUTELY PERFECT. I ORDERED A SIZE LARGER AS HE WILL GROW INTO THEM AND HE STILL WEARS THEM EVERYDAY! I REALLY WASN'T SURE HOW GOOD THEY WOULD BE BUT THEY ARE GREAT. I WOULD RECOMMEND FOR ANY LITTLE BOY OR GIRL THAT LIKES FIREMEN!!
customer_reviews.author: Mare of Cranston

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Boot
customer_reviews.text: This boot is very well made, waterproof and comfortable and absolutely adorable! Size runs large, but I didn't return because I can make it work and it will last along time.
customer_reviews.author: maggie mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, My neice loved them
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, My neice loved them. She says they are comfortable and fit well. T hey are nice and water tight for puddle jumping. Cute design with great handles for putting them on easier.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaa4444

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and durable
customer_reviews.text: A little too loose, but snuggly socks helped that! Really ridiculously cute and the butterfly stayed in place through a lot of puddle play and ocean beach fun. Dry toes after busy rainy days!
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: These appear to be made very well and hopefully he will be very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for Grandson's birthday. I understand his first pair did not hold up well. These appear to be made very well and hopefully he will be very happy with them. Will leave a follow-up review if there is anything negative to report.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: I bought these to go with the fireman raincoat. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with the fireman raincoat. They are made well. Still holding up well after 2 winters. I will hand them down to younger son.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Glory

customer_reviews.title: My grandson liked it. He had the fireman hat and the ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson liked it. He had the fireman hat and the Carter's yellow fireman jacket. All he needed was his fire engine and he was ready! He also loves puddles too.
customer_reviews.author: hjm

customer_reviews.title: but he will love them. They are well made
customer_reviews.text: Actually not sure of the fit. It is a christmas gift for my grandson, but he will love them. They are well made.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine 1234

customer_reviews.title: Quality looks good but these are a Christmas gift, so have not been used
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for grandson...have not tried them on, nor used product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend them in the snow
customer_reviews.text: Our little fire chief loves them! Don’t recommend them in the snow.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good Boots!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves stomping through the puddles in these. We live in a very wet climate most of the year so when I saw the price of these I was worried they wouldn't be quality but I was happily wrong! These are not only durable, they are adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Knutson

customer_reviews.title: Daily wear for a year
customer_reviews.text: Our future fire fighter wears these boots most days (indoors + out). They're holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Lau Rie

customer_reviews.title: Boys plus rain boot equals fun.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for my grandson, he loves boots and frogs, so he's a happy little fellow. The boots are very well made and arrived on time, in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Fit was a little larger than expected, not a problem because they're boots and he'll grow into them. Seem like great quality and he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: These boots hit a home run with granddaughter!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVES her boots. It’s a win-win purchase. Great quality and fit AND she thinks I’m great for finding them for her!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Great quality and the look amazing! Got these as a gift for my 3 year old nephew and he absolutely does NOT want to take them off! I would recommend these to anyone and we will definitely be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Stepheni Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Runs tall, a bit big.
customer_reviews.text: Not super high quality, but really nice anyways! Runs a little tall. My 2 year old is taller than most his age and these hit his knees.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Huff

customer_reviews.title: Not the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to determine the correct size boots for the child, the way the sizing is done. The boots were quite cute and the child loved them. He should be in them before the end of the season or by the next season.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Holman

customer_reviews.title: I love the look of these boots and the quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these boots and the quality. These boots are heavy for little ones. My daughter is only 2 and wears a 6.5. I ordered a 7 but they are somewhat bigger than I expected. We'll save them for later!
customer_reviews.author: BMM

customer_reviews.title: Not happy at all with them
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all with them. The pink is a dull light shade that looks dirty. The butterfly looks like it’s going to fall off (it’s glued on) and the graphics are stretched. These were a birthday present for my daughter and now I don’t want to give them to her.
customer_reviews.author: KLRSER

customer_reviews.title: Rainboots
customer_reviews.text: Child loves wearing these for walking the garden. and patio. Got them a size larger so child can grown into them. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: KidsnTeachin

customer_reviews.title: Cute boys boots
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality for the price. My son loves theses boots. They are easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: janinebck

customer_reviews.title: Happy kid - Happy mom!
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful. Loved the color and the design. My boy wont take them of in several weeks, even if it's not raining hehe!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Puddle Jumping 4 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: heavy duty rain boots for 4 year old puddle jumping grandson....these are the cutest boots ever and very easy on and off. Great price for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: GrammaTT

customer_reviews.title: Boys loved
customer_reviews.text: Grandsons loved these. Would of bee awesome if they were lined though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda E.

customer_reviews.title: Super cute but durable
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for durability and quality and got it. My 2 year old loves them and never wants to take them off. The fabric at the top did start to peel away but super glue fixed it right up. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Boys

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots that look like fire boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought this boot as a replacement for for my 6 year olds other boots. He was super excited to have another fire boot. Boots are light weight and flexible. It’s a rain boot that looks just like a fire boot. I would definitely buy these boots again.
customer_reviews.author: Newton K Miller

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: The size 6 toddler fit my 19 month old granddaughter very well.
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mom

customer_reviews.title: She'll grow into them and so we're pretty happy because she's happy
customer_reviews.text: Size 6 is larger than any other size 6 shoes we have. But my daughter loves them -- wants to wear them rain or shine. She'll grow into them and so we're pretty happy because she's happy.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves them, but they're just a little unstable.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old toddler LOVES these boots! They were also great for camping in Tahoe this summer! They're so easy for him to slip on and off, but I initially bought a size that is a little larger. The only drawback is that they were a little difficult for him to walk in- the somewhat rigid bottom makes it so that if you step incorrectly, you can fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: My son had these boots less than two months and wore them occasionally. They have now split on the back seam and are useless. I’ve bought other brands in a similar style and had them last a whole summer with every day wear. Very disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Severt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great boots! Not one problem here. Size 9 runs like a size 9.
customer_reviews.author: kathy r. peters

customer_reviews.title: Works for non wearable application
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a class demo - not to wear, so fit was not an issue. Appears to be well made and will work for my purpose. I had asked the seller a question about the actual dimensions of the boot (not the shoe size) and was disappointed in the poor response, but purchased anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Jim A

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old granddaughter picked these out and just loves them. The size is true to form and I like the handles that helps her pull them on. A win win for us.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sekishiro

customer_reviews.title: Adorable boots!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our grandson's Easter basket. He absolutely loves them! Though he wears a size 6 shoe, we bought toddler size 7, and they seem fine. Very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: kotcha

customer_reviews.title: Great little boos
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly and they are so cute, my great granddaughter loves them,
customer_reviews.author: Faye McCrady

customer_reviews.title: Cute and makes splashing in puddles especially fun! Ribbit
customer_reviews.text: Cute and makes splashing in puddles especially fun! Ribbit, jump, ribbit, jump - my kids love these rain boots. (I wish they came in adult sizes)
customer_reviews.author: TKHOD13

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of puddle fun wearing these so cute boots! He loves wearing them so much that he often wears them indoors, too! This is his second pair - next size up since the adorable matching raincoat still fits!
customer_reviews.author: Daffodilfan

customer_reviews.title: Size way too large
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in size 4 Toddler and another pair of rainboots in size 4/5 by another company. These are TWO INCHES longer than the other rainboots as well as 2 inches longer than my daughter's toddler size 4 TOMS winter boots and StrideRight sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: C. Flannery

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, nice sturdy rubber rain boot and very cute! My son loves them.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: This is a very pretty rain boot. My granddaughter loves them. She definitely has room to grow in them. I will just put on a heavy sock.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Adorable, runs a bit big
customer_reviews.text: I love them but they run a wee bit big for my daughter. She can walk around in them but they slip off when in her car seat. No big deal, she'll grow into them soon.
customer_reviews.author: Mama of 3, 3&under

customer_reviews.title: Boots were Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, Grand Daughter Loved them! Came in 3 days (shipping was to be 5-7 days)!
customer_reviews.author: MartyE

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my toddler grandson, who loves them! The handles makes them easy to put on himself and he loves splashing in the puddles! Good quality boots and fast shipping!
customer_reviews.author: Packer Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Love these versatile boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great for rain and snow. We needed snow boots last minute for mountains, took these tubing and worked great. The tread on the bottom helps a lot. Comfortable according to my 4 year old who is very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Momma

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter needed a new pair of rain boots. She loves these and they are perfect for her.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute! My son needs to wear thick socks with them as they run pretty large. Good quality and not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: KSD

customer_reviews.title: Juat right for puddle jumping.
customer_reviews.text: These boots are just what my son wanted. He wares them all the time. He has the matching Rain Coat and everywhere we go he gets compliments and what kid doesn't love that. Living on the Oregon Coast there are a lot of puddles to wade through and jump in. These boots are sturdy and will be a favorite hand-me-down.
customer_reviews.author: M.J.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product is nice, though the straps broke very easily....on the first wearing
customer_reviews.author: Chris Denmark

customer_reviews.title: Fun Kids Rain Boot
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered, the size ran large as stated, good quality, arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: Rmother

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy Momma.
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with these, that is until we saw that rescue is spelled resque. We noticed AFTER our announcement pictures had been shot so now we have to edit the photos to display the right spelling. This is my girlfriends first child so she is very displeased about having to do this.
customer_reviews.author: The Morrells

customer_reviews.title: Ordered these for my little guy for Halloween - great quality. Will be able to use throughout the ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my little guy for Halloween - great quality. Will be able to use throughout the rainy Fall/Winter seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: DAUGHTER LOVES THEM
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves her new boots and the butterfly. fits as expected. haven't worn them yet in the rain but she likes to stomp around in them regardless. easy for her to pull on herself.
customer_reviews.author: shandon hoffmeier

customer_reviews.title: Very well made !!!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these boots for our 6 year old granddaughter. She is living in Germany and is a member of a children's fire rescue team. These boots are cute and very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Sabine K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves these he also has the matching raincoat and umbrella
customer_reviews.author: Pene S.

customer_reviews.title: He only wants to wear these
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them. He was a firefighter for Halloween 🎃
customer_reviews.author: Georgette B.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his rain boots. Prefers them to actual shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fireman boots.
customer_reviews.text: For my grandson he is 4. He needs to go thru puddles when it rains. All his hand me down boots have big cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive. Found the same boots at Urban King last weekend for $10! Same exact boots!
customer_reviews.author: Carter

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go with a toddler's Halloween costume. He was thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: R. Brown

customer_reviews.title: So Cute
customer_reviews.text: They are really nice and made well. They were a Birthday gift for my grandaughter and she loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Dru Morris

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: They are very well made and so cute! They are a Christmas present so not sure how they fit yet.
customer_reviews.author: Tlaw

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price He liked and you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for price He liked and you have to see after wear from a little boy how they hold up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every little boy should have a pair.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his new fire chief boots. He loves them so much he wears them everywhere. He even tried to wear them to bed lol.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable galoshes, my son likes them. Haven't had the opportunity to 'play' in them yet...
customer_reviews.author: Erika B

customer_reviews.title: Solid and well made
customer_reviews.text: The rubber is solid and well made. The design and colors are perfect froggy green. My son loves them and wears them any chance he gets rain or shine!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so cute!
customer_reviews.text: My son, 3.5 y/o is obsessed with fire engines and he loves these boots! They’re great quality and reasonably priced. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves Them!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves these boots! He had to put them on immediately and wants to wear them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: SusanC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My 4-year-old loves these!!! He wears them almost every day just because lol
customer_reviews.author: babicountry

customer_reviews.title: style and quality  then price
customer_reviews.text: loved it and so did my grandson. very well work manship
customer_reviews.author: Malissa Gayergomez

customer_reviews.title: They made my grandson very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grandson. The smile told me all I needed to know. They fit great except under the covers.. It took some convincing to take them off for bedtime.😉
customer_reviews.author: CherMc

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction. Fit is a bit large so will have to wait to wear them awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with these boots. They have good quality and look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Irmarie Cervera

customer_reviews.title: Very well made & I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 yr grandson loved them! These boots are so cute & colorful. Matched perfect with a fireman’s raincoat that we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Bousk

product_meta.title: Puddle Play Toddler and Kids Waterproof Rubber Rain Boots with Easy-On Handles Boys and Girls Colors and Designs
product_meta.description: Introduce your child to fun times even when the weather isn't bright and sunny. With Puddle Play's Children Fire Rain Boots, your kid will have the time of their life outdoors even when it's raining cats and dogs. With the perfect piece of footwear to give to your energetic toddler, their laughs and giggles will brighten up your day even when the sun's not out. PRODUCT FEATURES RUBBER Sole and Upper Waterproof 13 Available Sizes from US Toddler 4 to US Little Kid 3 Easy-On Handles for Hanging and Easy Drying AVAILABLE PRINTS Fire Dog Red Fire Chief Black Fire Chief Ladybug Flower Frog PLAYTIME ALL THE TIME Don't let a little bad weather rain on your child’s parade! With our completely waterproof rain boots, you can allow your child to let out all the built-up energy and run, skip, jump to their heart's content. Of course, we understand any parent's concern of safety and how playing in the rain but you can rest assured our boots at 100% waterproof to keep your children free from wet feet, clothes, and socks altogether! The RUBBER material and soles help keep your young one comfortable so they don't feel any pain or aches during or after playtime. It's a must-have for your child whether it's a snowy winter morning or rainy spring evening! FUN COLORS Boy or girl, you're sure to find a fun colored look for your child! Every child is different and every child loves fun so we provide you with various options that are sure to please whatever interests match with your child. Your child is never going to want to take them off! Turn to Puddle Play whenever you need to excite your kid's life and bring enjoyment to gloomy weather with our wonderful Rain Boots!
feature_bullets: FUN IN THE RAIN: Don’t let a little rainy weather ruin your child’s playtime! With these fun children's rainboots, your kid will have the time of their splashing in puddles.
SLIP ON HANDLES: Kids can easily slip these on themselves with a simple tug on the easy-on handles. The handles also double as hanging hooks to store or dry the boots.
COMFORT & QUALITY: Lightweight RUBBER soles and upper, a durable rubber material and ultra-soft polyester fleece lining combine to ensure your child is comfortable and the boots last.
WATERPROOF PROTECTION: Don’t let your child catch a cold! Our boots are completely waterproof to keep your children’s socks, pants, and feet dry and fully protected.

CLEANING IS A BREEZE: With just a simple rinse in the sink or bathtub, your boy or girl's new favorite pair of rain boots will be dirt and mud free for the next rainy day. FEATURING: multiple designs Adorable Pink Flower with Green leaves, One Big Green Frog smiling, Fire Chief Resque "5" in Resque Symbol Yellow Stripes and Red Ladybug with black polka dots
